english.segment1: Before the break of that first dawn. You wrote the secrets of the world. And filled the ancient skies. With Your voice and light
english.segment2: Before the world began to spin. You knew the heart of broken men. And how to save our lives. With Your perfect sacrifice
english.segment3: What words could tell. What song could sing?
english.segment4: And bring. Glory to God above. Full of truth and endless love. He who is and was and always will be. I surrender to the one. Gentle and most powerful. Of all the things You are. You've chosen to be. A savior to me
english.segment5: You have made Your light to shine. Through the darkness of all time. And that light was life. In the face of Jesus Christ
english.segment6: You've caused a dawn within my soul. My heart no longer is my own. I want to praise You now. With every breath that You allow
english.segment7: What words could tell. What song could sing?
english.segment8: And bring. Glory to God above. Full of truth and endless love. He who is and was and always will be. I surrender to the one. Gentle and most powerful. Of all the things You are. You've chosen to be. A Savior to me
english.segment9: And I sing glory to God almighty (3x)
english.segment10: Glory to God above. Full of truth and endless love. He who is and was and always will be. And I surrender to the one. Gentle and most powerful. Of all the things You are. You've chosen to be. A Savior to me
english.segment11: And I sing glory to God almighty. And I sing glory. And I sing glory
english.segment12: And I sing glory. I sing glory. I sing glory. I sing glory
